disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Death Defied.

blurb.value: Innate: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.

description.value: Innate: Upon taking fatal damage, Karthus remains active for 7 seconds, rendering himself unable to move, basic attack, use summoner spells, or activate items, but becoming untargetable, invulnerable, and immune to crowd control for the duration as well as being able to use abilities at no cost.

description2.value: If Defile has been learned, it will remain toggled on for Death Defied's entire duration.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Upon Death, Karthus loses all status effects (inherently including crowd control effects) that do not inherently persist through death. An example for a debuff that does persist through death is Brand's Blaze. Death Defied will always trigger after resurrection effects. Death Defied will still trigger if Karthus is killed by the Nexus Obelisk. At the start of Death Defied, Karthus is set to  1 health. Karthus can still regenerate his health over the duration, but he will always die at the end of it. After Death Defied ends, the corpse of Karthus will retain unit collision despite being dead on the ground. Karthus' mana bar drains over the duration of Death Defied as an indicator of his time remaining in this state.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Lay Waste.

effect radius.value: 160

blurb.value: Active: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a small area, doubled when only one target is struck.

description.value: Active: Karthus creates a blast at the target location, briefly revealing the area and detonating after a 0.528 seconds to 0.759 seconds delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies within, doubled when hitting only one target.

description2.value: Lay Waste's damage is reduced by 15% against monsters.

description3.value: During Death Defied, Lay Waste will cast at maximum range if cast beyond that.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The delay between the cast and the detonation is inconsistent, but always matches up with the VFX.* This is almost certainly a bug. Defile's ticks beyond the first and Zac's Let's Bounce! have similar issues. Applies spell damage if it hits a single target and area damage if it hits multiple targets. Lay Waste also plays a different sound effect and uses a cosmetic critical strike when it only hits one target.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Wall of Pain.

blurb.value: Active: Karthus creates a passable wall. Enemies that touch it are briefly slowed and have their  magic resistance reduced.

description.value: Active: Karthus summons a passable wall of energy at the target location perpendicular to his facing for 5 seconds, granting sight around its pillars and center.

description2.value: For the duration, any enemy unit whose gameplay radius touches it is both slowed for 4 seconds, decaying over its duration, and  loses 15% magic resistance for the same duration.

description3.value: Each unit can only be affected once per cast.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Defile.

effect radius.value: 550

blurb.value: Passive: While toggled off, Karthus regains  mana whenever he kills a unit.

blurb2.value: Toggle: Karthus surrounds himself in the souls of his prey, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies, quickly draining his own  mana.

description.value: Passive: Karthus restores  mana whenever he kills an enemy.

description2.value: Toggle: Karthus deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all nearby enemies. Toggling Defile off deals 1 tick's worth of damage.

leveling2.value: Magic Damage Per Tick:»7.5 / 12.5 / 17.5 / 22.5 / 27.5 (+ 5% AP)«Damage Per Second:30 / 50 / 70 / 90 / 110 (+ 20% AP)

description3.value: Defile cannot be toggled off during Death Defied, but it can be while channeling Requiem.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *Toggle abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Defile also restores mana if Karthus destroys an enemy structure. Defile will automatically toggle on during Death Defied. Defile re-evaluates its damage with each tick, thus gaining/losing  AP or putting skill points into the ability will affect it immediately without the need to toggle it off and back on again. Defile persists through stasis effects. However, it will toggle off automatically if Karthus enters resurrection.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Requiem.

blurb.value: Active: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals magic damage to all enemy champions on the map.

description.value: Active: Karthus channels for 3 seconds then deals magic damage to all targetable enemy champions upon its completion.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Requiem's channel is telegraphed to all enemy champions by a beam of light that descends on all targets, including if they are untargetable or even dead. There is no visible beam if the enemy champion respawns during Requiem's channel, yet damage is applied normally. Requiem will affect clones. Karthus cannot cast Requiem if Death Defied's duration is less than 3 seconds. The damage will apply spell effects to targets in an order based on proximity to Karthus. Single target spell effects (such as Luden's Echo) are thus triggered on the closest enemy champion. The following table refers for interactions while Karthus is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Disabled Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled All the other item-actives are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by Flash Interrupted by Death Silencing effects
